lead_paragraph: Union officials said sticking points in the negotiations include bereavement time and uniform allowances for the bus drivers, plus a tiered payment system and vacation time.

headline.print_headline: Talks on Phoenix Bus Strike Hit an Impasse
headline.main: Talks on Phoenix Bus Strike Hit an Impasse

snippet: Union officials said sticking points in the negotiations include bereavement time and uniform allowances for the bus drivers, plus a tiered payment system and vacation time.
